definitions.definition: An academic discipline that seeks truth through reasoning rather than empiricism.
definitions.example: Philosophy is often divided into five major branches: logic, metaphysics, epistemology, ethics and aesthetics.

definitions.definition: A view or outlook regarding fundamental principles underlying some domain.
definitions.example: a philosophy of government;   a philosophy of education

definitions.definition: A calm and thoughtful demeanor; calmness of temper.
The size of type between long primer and pica, standardized as 11 point.
